I have an implementation problem. There is a line std::string nodeUuid = this->dataPtr->nUuid; in Node::WaitForSubscriber(). I have a compiler error:

/home/user/code/issue_47_wait/include/ignition/transport/Node.hh:991:45: error: invalid use of incomplete type ‘class ignition::transport::NodePrivate’
         std::string nodeUuid = this->dataPtr->nUuid;
                                             ^
/home/user/code/issue_47_wait/include/ignition/transport/Node.hh:62:11: error: forward declaration of ‘class ignition::transport::NodePrivate’
     class NodePrivate;

How can I use nUuid?
